def task1():
    tap($settings)
    # Assuming scroll_settings_page can be used to scroll through settings
    while True:
        elements = $settings_page_elements
        if len(elements.match('theme colors')) > 0:
            break
        tap($scroll_settings_page)
    theme_colors = elements.match('theme colors')[0]
    chosen_theme_color = get_text(theme_colors)
    tap(theme_colors)
    set_text($theme_color_input, 'Dark')
    tap($theme_color_ok)
    return chosen_theme_color
